headline: A Look At Hilton Worldwide Holdings (HLT) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Hilton Worldwide Holdings (HLT) is back in focus after a recent share move, with the stock closing at $311.78 and posting a 4.4% gain over the past month and 10.2% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Hilton Worldwide Holdings. While the 1 day and 7 day share price returns have slipped, Hilton’s 30 day share price return of 4.45% sits alongside a 1 year total shareholder return of 17.93%. This points to momentum that has been resilient over multiple years. If Hilton’s recent...
